title: Chris Hall: Hajdu says on COVID-19 Ottawa acted on 'the best advice possible at the time' - CBC.ca
description: This week on The House, federal Health Minister Patty Hajdu assesses Canada’s pandemic response thus far — and tells us why she thinks now is not the time to analyze the government’s steps. Meanwhile, the CBC’s Karina Roman takes a closer look at those steps …
content:
By Chris Hall, host ofThe House
Canada's health minister says she'll leave it to others to decide whether the federal government did enough to head off the spread of COVID-19.
"I think that's going to be the job of post-pandemic historians and public health… [+4299 chars]
